article_title: Jobs Should Be About Completing Tasks Not Social Justice

article_metadata.author: Jeffrey Dorfman

og.description: What is the point of a job today? Do employers hire people to get work done or so that they can provide their employees with some standard of living and set of benefits? To grow employment we need to return to an era when jobs were about work, not social justice.
